locations.name: your bedroom
locations.description:
The room is simple, with a single window facing the street thirty stories below. 
Your bed is covered with a simple grey blanket and a small pillow rests at the head.
Your closet is closed and a small box fan blows fresh air from the open window.

locations.name: the hall
locations.description:
The hall is empty, the walls bare except for a single painting of a lighthouse halfway along 
the left wall. The stairs to the rest of your apartment are at the end of the hall.

locations.name: the stairs
locations.description: You know what stairs look like.

locations.name: the living room
locations.description:
A small couch sits against the far wall to the left of the door. Opposite that is a small
but full bookcase, on top of which sits a television. Further left is the entrance to the kitchen.
This room is sparse, similar to your bedroom and hall.

locations.name: kitchen
locations.description:
Your kitchen is simple but well-equipped, with a hanging pot rack above the island in the center.
A sliding glass door at the rear leads out to a narrow balcony where your laundry is drying.

locations.name: the closet
locations.description:
Inside the closet you find several rain jackets and coats, a pair of atheltic shoes,
heavy boots, and sandals. On the right wall hangs your bike, and to the rear is the washing machine.

locations.name: the door
locations.description: Your door is heavy, with a pair of deadbolts and a chain lock. Your keys hang on a hook to your left.
